title: Pair your Mac with our favorite Thunderbolt 4 hub for a whopping 28% on Prime Day
content:
Macworld

This Prime Day, it’s time to get yourself one of these amazing 28 percent off the CalDigit Thunderbolt 4 Element Hub, now available for just $144, down from a $200 MSRP. This top-tier dock is Thunderbolt 4 certified and boasts 8 ports, making it a powerhouse for any setup, and it just so happens to be our pick for the best Thunderbolt 4 hub you can buy right now.

The Element Hub stands out with its ultra-impressive features. First, it has 8 ports and a 150W power supply, which is the highest one we’ve tested. There are so many ports, in fact, that you won’t ever worry about plugging something. You’ll get four USB-A ports and four USB-C ports, efficiently charging up any of your devices and plugging in peripherals. There’s also a 60W laptop PD system in place so your device is good to go at all times. There are four Thunderbolt 4 ports at 40GB/s, which are ideal for high-resolution displays. The hub also supports displays up to 8K at 60Hz or dual 4K at 60Hz.

So if you need more ports on your Mac, don’t miss the chance to upgrade your workstation with this powerful dock. Since this is a Prime deal, we suggest you hurry up to grab the CalDigit Thunderbolt 4 Element Hub for $144 at Amazon.

Snatch this CalDigit Thunderbolt hub
Buy it now at Amazon
